raw_text: The essential terms of such memoranda might well be embodied in an Executive order.

raw_text: This Commission can recommend no procedures for the future protection of our Presidents which will guarantee security.
phones: ðɪs kʌmɪʃʌn kæn ɹɛkʌmɛnd noʊ pɹʌsidʒɜ˞z fɔɹ ðʌ fjutʃɜ˞ pɹʌtɛkʃʌn ʌv aʊɜ˞ pɹɛzʌdɛnts wɪtʃ wɪl ɡɛɹʌnti sɪkjʊɹʌti.
speaker: default
clean_text: this commission can recommend no procedures for the future protection of our presidents which will guarantee security.
label: LJ_TEST

raw_text: The demands on the President in the execution of His responsibilities in today's world are so varied and complex

speaker: default
clean_text: the demands on the president in the execution of his responsibilities in today's world are so varied and complex
label: LJ_TEST

raw_text: and the traditions of the office in a democracy such as ours are so deep-seated as to preclude absolute security.
